sentences.sContent: It reacts violently with oxygen difluoride and barium peroxide .
sentences.sContent_eng: It reacts violently with oxygen difluoride and barium peroxide .
sentences.sCn: 一氧化碳同氟化氧、氧化钡会发生剧烈反应。

sentences.sContent: Objective To investigate the feasibility of derivatized polyvinylidene difluoride (PVDF) membrane used for solid phase sequencing of proteins and peptides.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To investigate the feasibility of derivatized polyvinylidene difluoride (PVDF) membrane used for solid phase sequencing of proteins and peptides.
sentences.sCn: 研究衍生聚偏二氟乙烯（PVDF） 膜用于蛋白质及肽的固相序列测定的可行性。
